      Deprecated.
      You must use Router.errorHandler(int, Handler) with 501 error

      Deprecated. 
      RouterFactory RouterFactory.setValidationFailureHandler​(Consumer<RoutingContext> validationFailureHandler)
      Deprecated.
      Router Factory won't manage the validation errors anymore.
